data.title: Saint James Church, New Alexandria, Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: Saint James Church, New Alexandria, Pennsylvania - Home page
data.meta_site_name: Saint James Church, New Alexandria, Pennsylvania
data.text:
Have you ever had a question about the faith you wanted an answer to but never had opportunity to ask? At our most recent Pastoral Council meeting, we discussed ways to provide ongoing opportunities for the adults of our parish to grow in their faith.

Through the discussion of the council, the suggestion was made that we provide parishioners the opportunity to submit questions, which would then be answered in the bulletin.

Use the area below to write your question. You will have the opportunity to include your name or ask the question confidentially. Thank you for participating!

What is your question regarding the Catholic Faith?

Name

Submit your question without your name

Submit my question anonymously

WeShare, now provides an easy way to plan out your Mass Intentions, Fuel & Maintenance, Weekly Offertory or second collection donations for the whole year!

To start today, click on the below Donate icon and View Collections or All Second Collections. Simply choose the amount you wish to contribute to each collection or second collection, enter a payment source, and submit your second collection donations for the entire year at one time. Make sure to check the “Recurs Annually” box if you wish to continue contributing year after year.

Please contact the parish office if you have questions or need help setting up your Collections or Second Collection donations. Thank you for your continued support to our parish!
